short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export your LinkedIn connections' profiles with email, Save your entire contacts list to CSV.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract and Save all your LinkedIn 1st-degree connections email and user profile to CSV.

v2.0.0 Update 
- Add enrich email with Email finder API, please contact us to add more providers.
- Most email finders need company name, please choose the extract user's company info option.

üî• FEATURES

‚úì Extract user profiles (company name, school name, address, location and etc)

‚úì Save and download 1st-degree connection list in CSV/EXCEL/JSON format

EXPORT COLUMNS
#Public Identifier, #Profile Link, #First Name, #Last Name, #Full Name, #Headline, #Picture URL, #Connected Date, #Websites, #Phone Numbers, #Wechat, #Twitter, #Email, #Company Name, #Company Title, #School Name, #Degree Name, #Field Of Study, #Industry Name, #Summary, #Location Name, #Country Name, #Address, #Prefer Country Code, #Prefer Language Code, #Birth Date, #Is Student
